compgc01

Class SendEmail

  • java.lang.Object
    • compgc01.SendEmail

  • public class SendEmail
extends Object
    A class that allows the sending of emails to customers of our application. Uses the JavaMail library by http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/index-138643.html and is adapted from the example at https://www.mkyong.com/java/javamail-api-sending-email-via-gmail-smtp-example/.
    Since:
    12.12.2017
    Author:
    Team 3: Filippos Zofakis and Lucio D'Alessandro
